snippet: TALBERT--Marilyn Joan, 86, formerly of Great Neck, NY, Fort Lee, NJ and Winchester Gardens, Maplewood, NJ, on July 12, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Jerome Talbert; devoted mother of Amy Hartwig and her husband, Charles; loving grandmother of Eva...
lead_paragraph: TALBERT--Marilyn Joan, 86, formerly of Great Neck, NY, Fort Lee, NJ and Winchester Gardens, Maplewood, NJ, on July 12, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Jerome Talbert; devoted mother of Amy Hartwig and her husband, Charles; loving grandmother of Evan and Abigail; dear daughter of the late Ida and Irving Greenberg. Services were held on July 14, 2016. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TALBERT, MARILYN JOAN
